name: Bandits: Phoenix Rising
storyline: Bandits: Phoenix Rising is a futuristic, racing action game, set in a post apocalyptic wasteland. The player follows the pair Rewdalf and Fennec as they try to survive and make big bucks at the same time.
summary: The game features a story driven single player mode or up to 8 players in deathmatch or team deathmatch over internet or LAN.
